data.title: South Sudan population 2024
data.meta_description:
Year wise population of South Sudan from 1950 to 2100 by United Nations. Data tables and
charts.
data.text:
The current population of South Sudan is 11,976,673 as of August 19, 2024, based on interpolation of the latest United Nations data. The population of South Sudan is projected at 11,277,092, or 11.28 million, as of July 1, 2024. The total population in South Sudan is projected at 11,088,796, or 11.09 million people for the year 2023.

South Sudan ranks 85th in the world by population on the 237 countries and territories list. South Sudan is ranked 32nd among 58 countries and territories in Africa.
